actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore foreign tax credits for taxes paid or accrued to Angola.

summary.text: Amend the Internal Revenue Code to restore foreign tax credits for taxes paid or accrued to Angola, unless the Secretary of State certifies to the Secretary of the Treasury that the Peace Accords for Angola are not being implemented.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore foreign tax credits for taxes paid or accrued to Angola.
